website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but if you want a maximum-security option, this sturdy device will deliver.
pros: Offers three versions to fit MacBooks, standard laptops, or Surface notebooks
Provides a high level of security with an aluminum locking station that outperforms most other options on the market
Includes a six-foot security cable, which is long enough for most users
cons: Expensive compared to other laptop lock options
Each version is limited to a particular model of laptop

customer_reviews.title: Has one major drawback
customer_reviews.text: The Kensington Laptop Locking Station is easy to set up, adjust and use, but it has one major drawback: you cannot close the computer with the lock in place. I bought this unit for my daughter to take to college, but I am going to replace it with a lock which allows the computer to be closed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Very good lock
customer_reviews.text: Seems relatively robust as computer locks go. It is still a cable lock and like any cable lock, could be clipped with limited difficulty. Is relatively heavy. The cables quite long which is good. Biggest drawback is that you cannot close the computer with it on, rather, it will be open to about a 45 degree angle or more. Probably the best option available for a Mac until Apple gets its act together and adds a port for a lock.
customer_reviews.author: Chas140

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but will see how practical it is to use
customer_reviews.text: Directions a bit confusing but I figured it out. Can’t close screen when locked🙁 but I knew that when I bought it. Deters theft. Expensive but not many options for Mac users. Bulky for transporting to library but really only weighs 3 pounds. I can see my college kid using in dorm room to secure laptop but will see if she goes for hassle of using it at library. Might be easier to throw laptop in book bag and take it with her to bathroom if needed.
customer_reviews.author: AnnS

customer_reviews.title: Very Well made
customer_reviews.text: The lock is very solid and substantial. Key works great. High quality construction. Precision fit. Easy to install. [I have a MacBook Pro 15 inch with touch bar, (A1707).] It is not the kind of lock you would want to carry around with you though. It is pretty heavy. Cable is thick would not be easily cut unless someone was walking around with a bolt cutter... I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Catbirdee53

customer_reviews.title: Lock for laptops without Kensington lock slot
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to lock my MacBook for a long time but couldn't because it does not have a Kensington slot until I found this product. The built quality is really good and it gets it job done. The only thing I do not like is the combination lock came with it. To use the included combination lock, you will have to installed/screw a small provided hardware onto the Kensington slot. After that, you can use the combination lock to lock onto that hardware. If you want to use a different locking cable, say a keyed lock, you will have to remove that hardware to expose the Kensington slot.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to the Macbook no lock problem
customer_reviews.text: This provided the perfect solution to securing my MacBook Pro when in a public place doing research. I need to be able to step away from the table where my laptop is being used at times and with this lock, I am able to do that without worrying about someone walking off with my laptop. I like how it doesn't need to be screwed into the laptop itself. It is a perfect fit and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle  Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this locking station back in July. I was hesitant due to the negative reviews I read about the weight of the station. I should have heeded the warning! I recently upgraded my MacBook to a newer, lighter model. The dinosaur Mac I had was heavy and slowly starting to die. With the new MacBook, there was no longer a port for a security cable. I thought this locking station would be the perfect solution. Unfortunately, it is not convenient to travel with due to the weight of it. Thumbs down from this buyer. I wouldn't recommend buying it if you are planning to travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Cozzocrea

customer_reviews.title: Fits my ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty snug fit, barely fit. However it does fit and locks just fine. Feels secure. On the downside if someone were to force the laptop closed it would shatter the screen, so that's something to keep in mind. If you would rather have a broken laptop than a stolen one this is the way to go. I know I would rather have a broken one than a stolen one. My data is important.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey alexander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent locking solution
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a simple Kensington lock with a T-bar, however, I did not realize that my MacBook (2015 MacBook with Retina Display, 13 inch) lacked the Kensington port. Instead, I purchased the locking station, and I find it to be an excellent solution. Out of the box, it must be adjusted using an Allen wrench in order to fit the size of the laptop on which it is being used, but it is easy to open and close. In summary, a very sturdy, excellent locking solution for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Assa

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose but
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose but it can easily damage the MacBook screen that can cost $450 or above. If you're like me who always happen to flip down the cover lid, you can accidentally flip down while the lock is on.
customer_reviews.author: Damn

customer_reviews.title: Security for thin laptops
customer_reviews.text: When I found out my laptop didn't have a security port, I was almost in disbelief. However, this lock system works like a charm. While it is definitely on the pricier side, it does exactly what you'd need it to do. Setting it up was a little tedious, but once I figured it out I felt dumb for not getting it sooner. Overall, I'd recommend this to anyone looking for laptop security.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ensslin

customer_reviews.title: Secure laptop lock for MacAir
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were a bit difficult to understand for an older adult to follow - but with the help of a younger person, the setup was easy. It is now very easy to use. I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Sue OKC

customer_reviews.title: Clunky and heavy, very niche product
customer_reviews.text: It does its job. I got the version with the keyed lock. In retrospect, it's less hassle to use the number lock. Honestly, the only reason this product exists is because Macbooks don't even have a lock hole.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!! It will brake you screen.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the his product. It is not designed well and will cause harm to your laptop. I bought one for a new MacBook Pro. The design is such that you can’t close the screen. If you attempt to close it it a bit it will bind your screen in a wedge situation and cause your screen to crack thus making it useless. I bought a $2500 laptop and this product that is supposed to keep it safe will actually break your screen. Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bernasconi

customer_reviews.title: Good solution for thin laptops
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected and is a good solution for light/thin laptops without a built in security connector. The assembly instructions could have been a little clearer, but it wasn't so bad to warrant taking away a star. I purchased this for my daughter to take to college so I won't be able to take advantage of the units ability to permanently attach to a desk. Overall I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: R. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would leave less then one star. The product worked for all of one day. Out of the box it worked fine by the time I got to work the next day it no longer powers on. Reached out to Kensington and was told to unplug it and plug it back in. They then told me to contact the reseller which was Amazon. They could/would not help me at all. I now have a $125.00 paper weight. Thanks Amazon and Kensington.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fees

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Using it for my MB pro, and it’s excellent. Does exactly what it’s supposed to. And it’s nice since the MB pro does not have a lock port. So this solution is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: M- AZ Review

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my ASUS laptop secure at my desk. I was disappointed to not have a Kensington lock port on my laptop but I tried this and it's a good alternative. Not nearly as annoying as I thought it would be and it doesn't interfere with any visuals on my screen.
customer_reviews.author: cozzac

customer_reviews.title: Needed to secure a laptop
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a common area computer at an apartment building after our previous computers had been stolen (we were using just a thick cable). These are far more sturdy and give me a much better feeling about our security - the laptop would essentially have to broken in order to be removed!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: its not as big as it seems
customer_reviews.text: I love my locking station, I feel good about leaving my laptop unattended in my boutique and it is not that bulky as I thought it would be, it doesn't take that much space extra and is not eye bothering too look at
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA MORENO PARRA

customer_reviews.title: Seems legit.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be doing the trick. Nobody’s tried to steal my laptop so I don’t really know how well it works. It seems sturdy. It’s not getting 5 stars because I had difficulty putting it together. More assembly than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Sale LAc

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We had to find a way for our mackbooks to stop sprouting legs. We tried adhesive locking devices, but they proved ineffective. We tired these locks and we were surprised by the design and effectiveness. We ended up buying 20.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great For Light Security; Fast & Easy
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the office for my personal computer. Only need light security and this fits the bill. Easy to install, computer slips in and out in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Barry B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid security device.
customer_reviews.text: Tank-like solidity. Should make it very difficult for the usual run of thieves who work public places, even offices and libraries.
customer_reviews.author: William Arnold Beetstra

customer_reviews.title: Good security bar for MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust. Order included a cable & lock. Also works with my old cable & lock. Allows access to ports on my Mac. Wish the MacBook supported a physical lock, so this is good to have in lieu of that
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Allen

customer_reviews.title: Secures my MBP
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and works well for securing my MBP. A little heavy to use as a portable lock.
customer_reviews.author: unknown soldier

customer_reviews.title: Very secure lock, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Secures the computer well. Does not interfere with daily operations on the computer. Not the lock you want to travel with. It is very heavy. Put me over the fifty limit with one of my suitcases. Had to do some adjusting at check in. Other then that very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MacBook Pro security lock
customer_reviews.text: This MacPro lock doesn't take up an output port and is formidable that a thief will think twice. I tried two before and they didn't encourage me as this did.
customer_reviews.author: ObjectClass

customer_reviews.title: The locking mechanism was non functional
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I received a defective product. The locking mechanism did not work because the latch was too loose. I could easily disengage the latch with my hands with minimal force. Thus I had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gonzales-Luna

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but laptop must be open while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Molly C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Locking station for MacBooks
customer_reviews.text: Have been waiting for a product like this. Very secure and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Leong

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works. Sometimes a bit awkward to unlock. Otherwise, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks like it'll last
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter's laptop. She was able to install it, it looks like it'll help protect the laptop and should last a reasonable duration.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep someone from walking off my laptop at the gig. Easy to attach and detach.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Ok, best it can be I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Not really elegant, but it works. Function over form for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Mason

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Lock feels flimsy but it is secure. It’s adjustable fitting two different computers that I own.
customer_reviews.author: magicrox

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to a common problem
customer_reviews.text: I had to secure a 15” MacBook Pro provided by work. I cannot change the body of the laptop so this lock was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Secures laptops without a lock slot
customer_reviews.text: This will do the trick to secure my laptop in libraries. (I just wish I’d known my laptop had no lock slot before I bought it.) What I don’t like is that you can’t close the computer and the unit is pretty pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Visual security
customer_reviews.text: Take your eyes off your laptop for a moment in a coffee shop and it could easily be stolen. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Good build and strong construction laptop lock
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy to carry around but it is a good and sturdy laptop lock.
customer_reviews.author: Occasionally shopper

customer_reviews.title: This product is a crap. The locker does not work and blocks after ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a crap. The locker does not work and blocks after 8 months. And the stickers on the aluminium melt because of the laptop heat, and they leave sticky traces.
customer_reviews.author: flora

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: This product solved the issue of the Air not having a lock. It is very easy to set up and my daughter will have a secure computer for the start of college.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Daniolos

customer_reviews.title: missing a part
customer_reviews.text: Wasted two hours trying to put it together was missing a part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It meets my need but wish the lock was easier to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kensington MacBook and Surface Laptop Locking Station with Keyed Lock Cable (K64453WW)
product_meta.description: Style:Keyed LockThe Kensington Laptop Locking Station 2.0 was created to protect the MacBook, MacBook Air, Surface laptops and other laptops that don't include a security lock slot. Providing the trusted protection that has made Kensington The Professionals' Choice in laptop security for over 25 years, the Laptop Locking Station 2.0 is the preferred desktop security solution for laptops without security slots.
feature_bullets: Lock your MacBook, MacBook Air, Surface Laptop 1 and 2, Chromebook, and other thin laptops and notebooks with the 11"-15" Adjustable security arms (15" Is the widest width laptop screen - a laptop that's 15.6" Is measured diagonally, so they will fit); does not interfere with a MacBook touch Bar

Non-invasive locking technology requires no hardware modifications to the laptop, preserving your laptop's aesthetics and hardware warranty; scratch-resistant bumpers line the back wall and base to protect your laptop from cosmetic damage
Professional-level design provides a sleek, brushed aluminum locking station that provides side port access and superior flexibility in laptop engagement
Keyed Laptop Lock with 6' Cable included to tether Laptop Locking Station to any fixed structure; can also be secured to a desk with the included mounting holes and screws
2 year Warranty and lifetime technical support; Not valid If purchased on Amazon from an unauthorized reseller (microcart, moon Tech, pcnation are all unauthorized)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars187 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
